log(result);}main();Adding documents into an indexconst { SearchClient, AzureKeyCredential } = require("@azure/search-documents");const client = new SearchClient("<endpoint>", "<indexName>", new AzureKeyCredential("<apiKey>"));To list all results of a particular query, you can use search with a search string that usessimple query syntax:JavaScriptFor a more advanced search that uses Lucene syntax, specify queryType to be full:JavaScriptasync function main() {  const uploadResult = await client. uploadDocuments([    // JSON objects matching the shape of the client's index    {},    {},    {},  ]);  for (const result of uploadResult.results) {    console.log(`Uploaded ${result.key}; succeeded? ${result.succeeded}`);  }}main();Perform a search on documentsconst { SearchClient, AzureKeyCredential } = require("@azure/search-documents");const client = new SearchClient("<endpoint>", "<indexName>", new AzureKeyCredential("<apiKey>"));async function main() {  const searchResults = await client.search("wifi -luxury");  for await (const result of searchResults.
